content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found)
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0) 

### Electricity generator at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0)
Consists of 
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Pipe groups (positions x=107.5 y=-34.5 and x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of 
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belts (positions x=63.5 y=-53.5 and x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have fuel before use.
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_FUEL state.

### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NOT_CONNECTED state.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before use.
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_INGREDIENTS state.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have source items before use.
-  Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS state.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been assigned or invoked in the given execution logs.
